name: Museum of the Living Past
description:
Welcome to The Museum of the Living Past, a VR game about exploring the history of ancient Native American artifacts through a firsthand interactive experience. 

Use different tools in five short minigames:

  • Atlatl & Spear
  • Stone Axe
  • Bow & Arrow
  • Fishing Basket
  • Stone Hoe

A student project from Kennesaw State University

Created by Joshua Hilliard, JaDante Hendrick, and Larry Keen
